ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] <-------idiot
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The GM s will help with the bags of stuff disappearing durning a trade. Just state to them that you traded the bug of stuff, please specifiy to them
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
wrote:
> Well, I did report it and was told there was nothing
> that could be (or would
> be) done about the situation. However, at the end
> of the night, the gm
> finally asked that I write her an email explaining
> the situation. Hopefully
> that will help matters.
>
> The character who actually stole it was Razel,
> although he said it was his
> "friend" Bonewalker who was playing Razel and stole
> the items. I am told
> that Razel is actually a good guy and was taken
> advantage of as well but I
> just don't know what to believe.
>
> The funniest part of the story is that Razel
> actually gave a friend of mine
> all his druid items for me to hold as collateral.
> However, when my friend
> tried to trade them to me, one of the items was a
> full LIght Burlap Sack
> (which is lore). When we hit trade, the items in
> the bag and the bag itself
> poofed. And of course the gms won't believe this
> either - they say my
> friend kept the items but I know he did not. So,
> now I will have to
> replace all this guys items as well. I'm told that
> there is a fairly well
> known bug with lore containers poofing but I did not
> have any knowledge of
> that before...
>
> Anyway thanks for the support friends :)
>
> Tani/Hally
>
-----------------

The GM's will help with the bags of stuff disappearing
durning a trade. Just state to them that you traded
the bug of stuff, please specifiy to them exactly what
was in the bag. Also make sure and tell them that you
did not set the bag on the ground. It is a known bug
to the GM's that this is happening.
This happened to me the other night, and the GM
replaced everything in the bag except for one item.
This was much more than I had expected and was very
pleased that I got anything back at all.
Good luck all and remember, the GM's may surprise you
once in a while:)

-Sing
